sentence.text: Thus, our data indicate that in pancreatic cancer cells, the expression of positive regulation of protein phosphorylation may be controlled by a pathway mediated by transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: In addition, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation was found to be related to the spheroid-forming ability of cells and to be involved in the invasive capacity of pancreatic cancer cells
